mapper.sql: F_BUDING_ID, F_BUDING_CODE, F_CENTER_ID, F_BUDING_NAME, F_BUDING_NODE, F_BUDING_LETTER, F_BUDING_OWNER, F_BUDING_OWNER_COMPANY, F_COUNTY_AREA, F_BUDING_CONTACT, F_CONTACT_INFORMATION, F_BUDING_DETECTION, F_BUDING_ADDRESS, F_BUDING_STATE, F_DATE_COMPLETION, F_BUDING_DATE, F_BUDING_LONGITUDE, F_BUDING_LATITUDE, F_BUDING_LAYERSON, F_BUDING_LAYERSUNDER, F_BUDING_HEIGHT, F_BUDING_FUNCTION, F_BUDING_AREA, F_AIRCONDITIONER_AREA, F_HEATING_AREA, F_BUDING_YNRS, F_HEATING_MODE, F_COOLING_MODE, F_AIRCONDITIONER_SYSTEM, F_HEATING_SYSTEM, F_BUDING_COEFFICIENT, F_ARCHITECTURAL_FORM, F_EXTERIORWALL_FORM, F_EXTERIORWALL_INSULATION_FORM, F_BUDING_EXTERIOR_TYPE, F_BUDING_GLASS_TYPE, F_MATERIAL_TYPE, F_SAVING_STANDARD, F_SAVING_TRANSFORMATION, F_BUDING_GOVERNMENT, F_BENCHMARKING, F_SCHEME_DESIGN, F_OPERATOR_NAME, F_ENGINEERING_CONSTRUCTION, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS_BGDH, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS_YDDH, F_BUDING_POPULATION, F_MONITORING_AREA, F_SYSTEM_SOFTWARE, F_COLLECTOR_TYPE, F_ENTRY_TIME, F_DETECTION_TIME, F_ACCEPTANCE_TIME, F_UPDATE_TIME, F_DESIGN_ORGANIZATION,F_DESCRIBE
mapper.select:
select
,(case F_BUDING_DETECTION when '1' then '启用检测' when '0' then '停用检测' else '' end ) as JCZTMC from bes_buding_information
1=1
and CONCAT(`F_BUDING_CODE`,'##',`F_BUDING_NAME` ) LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keywords},'%')
select F_DATACENTER_ID ID,F_DATACENTER_NAME NAME from bes_data_center
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO bes_buding_information (F_BUDING_ID, F_BUDING_CODE, F_CENTER_ID, F_BUDING_NAME, F_BUDING_NODE, F_BUDING_LETTER, F_BUDING_OWNER, F_BUDING_OWNER_COMPANY, F_COUNTY_AREA, F_BUDING_CONTACT, F_CONTACT_INFORMATION, F_BUDING_DETECTION, F_BUDING_ADDRESS, F_BUDING_STATE, F_DATE_COMPLETION, F_BUDING_DATE, F_BUDING_LONGITUDE, F_BUDING_LATITUDE, F_BUDING_LAYERSON, F_BUDING_LAYERSUNDER, F_BUDING_HEIGHT, F_BUDING_FUNCTION, F_BUDING_AREA, F_AIRCONDITIONER_AREA, F_HEATING_AREA, F_BUDING_YNRS, F_HEATING_MODE, F_COOLING_MODE, F_AIRCONDITIONER_SYSTEM, F_HEATING_SYSTEM, F_BUDING_COEFFICIENT, F_ARCHITECTURAL_FORM, F_EXTERIORWALL_FORM, F_EXTERIORWALL_INSULATION_FORM, F_BUDING_EXTERIOR_TYPE, F_BUDING_GLASS_TYPE, F_MATERIAL_TYPE, F_SAVING_STANDARD, F_SAVING_TRANSFORMATION, F_BUDING_GOVERNMENT, F_BENCHMARKING, F_SCHEME_DESIGN, F_OPERATOR_NAME, F_ENGINEERING_CONSTRUCTION, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS_BGDH, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS_YDDH, F_BUDING_POPULATION, F_MONITORING_AREA, F_SYSTEM_SOFTWARE, F_COLLECTOR_TYPE, F_ENTRY_TIME, F_DETECTION_TIME, F_ACCEPTANCE_TIME, F_UPDATE_TIME) VALUES
(#{item.fBudingId},#{item.fBudingCode},#{item.fCenterId}, #{item.fBudingName},#{item.fBudingNode},#{item.fBudingLetter}, #{item.fBudingOwner},#{item.fBudingOwnerCompany},#{item.fCountyArea}, #{item.fBudingContact},#{item.fContactInformation}, #{item.fBudingDetection},#{item.fBudingAddress},#{item.fBudingState}, #{item.fDateCompletion},#{item.fBudingDate},#{item.fBudingLongitude}, #{item.fBudingLatitude},#{item.fBudingLayerson},#{item.fBudingLayersunder}, #{item.fBudingHeight},#{item.fBudingFunction},#{item.fBudingArea}, #{item.fAirconditionerArea},#{item.fHeatingArea},#{item.fBudingYnrs}, #{item.fHeatingMode},#{item.fCoolingMode},#{item.fAirconditionerSystem}, #{item.fHeatingSystem},#{item.fBudingCoefficient},#{item.fArchitecturalForm}, #{item.fExteriorwallForm},#{item.fExteriorwallInsulationForm}, #{item.fBudingExteriorType},#{item.fBudingGlassType}, #{item.fMaterialType},#{item.fSavingStandard},#{item.fSavingTransformation}, #{item.fBudingGovernment},#{item.fBenchmarking},#{item.fSchemeDesign}, #{item.fOperatorName},#{item.fEngineeringConstruction}, #{item.fEngineeringContacts},#{item.fEngineeringContactsBgdh}, #{item.fEngineeringContactsYddh},#{item.fBudingPopulation}, #{item.fMonitoringArea},#{item.fSystemSoftware},#{item.fCollectorType}, #{item.fEntryTime},#{item.fDetectionTime},#{item.fAcceptanceTime}, #{item.fUpdateTime} )

insert into bes_buding_information (F_BUDING_ID, F_CENTER_ID,F_BUDING_CODE, F_BUDING_NAME, F_BUDING_NODE, F_BUDING_LETTER, F_BUDING_OWNER, F_BUDING_OWNER_COMPANY, F_BUDING_CONTACT, F_CONTACT_INFORMATION, F_BUDING_DETECTION, F_BUDING_ADDRESS, F_BUDING_STATE, F_BUDING_DATE, F_BUDING_LONGITUDE, F_BUDING_LATITUDE, F_BUDING_LAYERSON, F_BUDING_LAYERSUNDER, F_BUDING_HEIGHT, F_BUDING_FUNCTION, F_BUDING_AREA, F_AIRCONDITIONER_AREA, F_HEATING_AREA, F_BUDING_YNRS, F_HEATING_MODE, F_COOLING_MODE, F_AIRCONDITIONER_SYSTEM, F_HEATING_SYSTEM, F_BUDING_COEFFICIENT, F_ARCHITECTURAL_FORM, F_EXTERIORWALL_FORM, F_EXTERIORWALL_INSULATION_FORM, F_BUDING_EXTERIOR_TYPE, F_BUDING_GLASS_TYPE, F_MATERIAL_TYPE, F_SAVING_STANDARD, F_SAVING_TRANSFORMATION, F_BUDING_GOVERNMENT, F_BENCHMARKING, F_SCHEME_DESIGN, F_ENGINEERING_CONSTRUCTION, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS, F_ENGINEERING_CONTACTS_BGDH, F_BUDING_POPULATION, F_MONITORING_AREA, F_ENTRY_TIME, F_DETECTION_TIME,
F_ACCEPTANCE_TIME,
F_DESIGN_ORGANIZATION,F_DESCRIBE) values (#{fBudingId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCenterId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{fBudingCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingNode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingLetter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingOwnerCompany,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fContactInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingDetection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingLayerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingLayersunder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingHeight,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingFunction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fAirconditionerArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fHeatingArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingYnrs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fHeatingMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fCoolingMode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fAirconditionerSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fHeatingSystem,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingCoefficient,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fArchitecturalForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fExteriorwallForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fExteriorwallInsulationForm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingExteriorType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingGlassType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fMaterialType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fSavingStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fSavingTransformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingGovernment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBenchmarking,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fSchemeDesign,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fEngineeringConstruction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fEngineeringContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fEngineeringContactsBgdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fBudingPopulation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fMonitoringArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fEntryTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fDetectionTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update bes_buding_information

mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) AS BjxxCount
from bes_buding_information
1 = 1
